name: HnyB Inc.
tag_list: social, technology, hnyb, technologies, media, research, innovation
overview:
HnyB Inc is a Global Company backed by passionate technologists to bring extraordinary innovations which can make positive changes in everyone’s life by making Social Access and Management easier.

With Presence in India, Dubai & Singapore, HnyB Inc powers the design, development and Management of Social Technologies.

HnyB Inc’s associate companies are working in various Social Media Domains like Social Intelligence, Social Conversations, Social Research etc. Extraordinary Experienced and Passionate Team of HnyB Inc is working on many projects which will bring revolution in the way we manage and use Social Technologies in our daily lives.

As a company, and as individuals, we value integrity, honesty, openness, personal excellence, constructive self-criticism, continual self-improvement, and mutual respect. We are committed to our customers and partners and have a passion for technology. We take on big challenges, and pride ourselves on seeing them through. We hold ourselves accountable to our customers, shareholders, partners, and employees by honoring our commitments, providing results, and striving for the highest quality.

Our team consists of digital pioneers, some of the foremost thinkers in social business, and a growing group of experienced professionals bringing an unmatched mix of proven expertise and forward-looking vision.
